name: beige
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a pale brown colour: The shoes are available in navy blue or beige. The decor is dominated by shades of beige, brown and ivory. Compare
ecru noun
blackred/E+/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesShe wears a lot of beige.I like this shade of beige.

pale brown in colour: The walls are white and the ceiling is beige. The beige rug is stained and spotted.
More examplesFewer examplesEverything inside the house is beige or dark brown.If your diet is all beige and brown, you are in trouble.Brush a shimmery beige shadow over the eyelids.
